inclusion.criterion: evidence of definite or probable tuberculous pericarditis
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: within 1 week of starting antituberculosis treatment
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: presence of an alternative cause of pericardial disease
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: use of corticosteroids within the previous month
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: hypersensitivity or allergy to the Mycobacterium w vaccine
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: patient has a history of viral encephalitis/meningitis and CSF leak with meningitis
